titleStmt.title: The upright Protestant, as he was reformed from the superstitious errours of popery in the happy reignes of Edward the 6th. Qu. Elizabeth, and K. Iames of blessed memory. And for whom this (thrice happy) Parliament will live and die.
titleStmt.author: Palmer, Herbert, 1601-1647.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for George Lindsey, and are to be sold at his shop over against the London-Stone,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop over against the London-Stone
